markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Gnoll Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2792) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You were taught to be a hunter and a raider. You are trained with [flails](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19), [khopeshes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=94), [mambeles](/Weapons.aspx?ID=96), [spears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), and [war flails](/Weapons.aspx?ID=46).

<title level="2">Gnoll Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Gnoll Weapon Practicality](/Feats.aspx?ID=2797)
name: Gnoll Weapon Familiarity
